Name: Road Draftsman
About the game: Road Draftsman is a fun combination of parking and puzzle game in which you draw the path of cars to their parking spot. In order to draw the trajectory of the car, you need to click the left mouse button and draw a line. Features: • 60 exciting levels; • nice graphics; • addictive gameplay.
